column4: Another question, I had installed a FireStarter for my ubuntu, but When I try to start it , it said PPP0(my internet connection) not actived, fail to start it . It's a pppoe connection, it already dialed and eth0 is ok either, buy why, thanks
why are you wanting to run firestarter on a ppp connection?
I'm a newbie to linux, so i can't set up firewall without firestarter
why do you need to change the default rules?
default rules? Can default rules allow aMule or Az p2p.. these things?
what apps i dont need?  amule?
h3XIS, how to do that?  use the default rules, IPTAbles?
you dont need to mess with them, theyre fine as is
hello.. Ubuntu didnt start a firewall by default, isnt it?  how terrible without at least a simple firewall in the world
Did you guys mean, on a lonely pc, it is not neccessary to setup a firewall, or its not useful?
it's not necessary. it is fine as is
So you dont have any firewall?
